name: Keith Croakman & The Bad Mountains
description:
A small interactive environment put together to improve my pixel art. You can tap/click to have a look around and make things happen. Background assets are available here if you want to take a look at them.

Thank you to everyone who hung out on stream while we put this together.

Credits:

"The Sasquatch" - By Giant Monster
City ambience - https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/
Additional audio from https://freesound.org
Created in Construct 3 & Aseprite
